item.title: Evo Scape: how do i make starter different and ip thing
item.dc:creator: @tha_nickscape_guy tha nickscape guy
item.description:
@tha_nickscape_guy wrote:

search for the…

You can no longer receive any starter packages
in client.java I think and if you scroll a LITTLE bit up you'll see the command "starter" you should see something like this.. [code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 50000000); sendMessage("Your official Nick World starter package!"); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("Bad idea..."); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Has just tried to recieve more than 1 starter package! Fool!"); 
        }
    }[/code]

Change the

addItem(995, 50000000);

995 and 50000000 in that line. 995 means the Item ID and 50000000 means The Item amount. Hope i helped ;).

Read full topic
